issue.title: [R] Add extra documentation for test_dplyr_equal helper function
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13838](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13838). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add more detail to the documentation block at https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/r/tests/testthat/helper-expectation.R#L73-L83

Something along the lines of “This compares results from using dplyr/base R to what is produced when using Arrow”

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13838?focusedCommentId=17444036) by Jonathan Keane (jonkeane):*
This was superseded / accomplished in ARROW-14310 yeah?
